1.0.name: wordpress/sk-testimonials
1.0.description:
The SK Testimonials Plugin allows you to list and display Testimonials on your site. You can list them in any order, by groups, through widgets or shortcodes. You have full functionality to how your testimonials are built and displayed.

  1. Easy To Manage
  2. Easy To Add and Edit
  3. Contextual Help Documentation in the WordPress admin
  4. Widgets, Shortcodes, and Template Tags
  5. Display and design management
  6. Global Settings for output
  7. Testimonials show up in /testimonials/ on your site
  8. Testimonial slugs use the business and customer name
  9. Custom Template files can be overridden by placing files called index-testimonial.php or single-testimonial.php in your theme
  10. Image defaults to Gravatar's "Mystery Man"
  11. Customize your slug away from "testimonials" to whatever you want, if you want
  12. Cache your custom CSS for page speed load time optimization
